title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)

sample: 98 mol %;0.02 water mass %(de-gassed by freezing and melting in vacuum;dried by vacuum heating)
components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium methyl sulfate

ref.full: Singh, T.; Kumar, A. (2009) J. Solution Chem. 38, 1043-1053.
ref.title: Temperature Dependence of Physical Properties of Imidazolium Based Ionic Liquids: Internal Pressure and Molar Refraction
